Room.Name: Yab's Sitting Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the sitting room of Yab the Illusionist.
Room.LongDescription: Yab is the most powerful of all who have chosen to master the craft of illusion. Others before her time gained power and respect by learning to make things appear differently than what they really are. Yab taught Trantori, the High Invoker, how to make the mice at Khallazar's to appear as powerful three-headed snakes. A pillar supports a sparkling amethest. Is it an illusion, or is there nothing else here?
